title: Nerf Malphite R
body:
There is absolutely no reason why every time I come back alive as an ADC, that Malphite can 1-shot me using his Ult and then his "smash" (whatever ability that Is).

Absolutely no way to avoid it. Can't cast my ult during it. Ridiculous. I know it's his ult but it almost feels like an abused situation when it leads to a 1-shot if it lands. I can't think of any other skills that when they land lead to no way of getting out? Even Amumu has an incredibly strong ult but it doesn't insta-kill you. Fiddlesticks as well. 


I am seeing a repeated number of Malphite's doing this in games now. Nerf it.

replies.body: Honestly he needs a rework. He needs less power on his ult and more power distributed across the rest of his kit. He is outdated.

Yea he is outdated. Not many people seem to realize how powerful his W is actually, I mean it can give around 300-400 Armor when his passive is up not to mention it turns his auto-attacks into AoE nukes. But for sure a lot of his power is tied up in the Ult and it makes the rest of his kit basically a tool to survive until your Ult comes back up.
Couldn't have worded that any better. For being a anti AD tank, he legit sucks at it nowadays with all these ways of ignoring his armor via true damage.

Fiddle's also has a giant AoE that it effects AND Malphite's ult DOES have a sound effect when he uses it that makes it really easy to listen for and then Kai'Sa or Xayah ult and dodge it guaranteed 100% of the time. The fact that you don't is you not understanding the game.

How about you try going back to the days when Yi had a 100% AP ratio on Alpha Strike and a 300% AP ratio on the heal on his W with it still giving him high enough damage reduction to be nearly invulnerable. Seasons 1-3, this version of Yi, the AP Yi, completely stomped everyone from bronze 5 to plat 1 (what was then the highest rating in the game). It had no counterplay other than the usual Yi counterplay of stunning him for 10,000,000 years and praying you can kill him before he gets off Meditate. He was so broken that you'd be reported for trolling if you didn't get at least 5 pentas in a game with him (unless the enemy team ff'd at 20). If he wasn't banned, he was the only viable pick in the entire game.

Or how about beta Yi, who had Highlander on his Q with all the same effects as current Highlander, but on a 20 second cooldown, passive was a chance on every auto to hit twice, W was just Meditate but useless, E was a toggle that made his autos deal bonus true damage and cost mana, and R was Alpha Strike, but it hit 10 people and had a 300% AD ratio.

How about old Eve, who had a targeted 3 second stun every time she came out of her minute-long stealth?

Beta TF, who had gold card as an AoE, passive to give all allies globally some free crit chance, and his E was a global version of the teleport from his ult with a 30 second cooldown, ult was the same as it is, but with a slow attached that also made his E teleport instant.

I just had an AD Malph on my team and once again, broken. Almost the same score as the AP Malph that caused me to write this in the first place. And a lot of his issue (in this case his success....) came from his OP Ult.
Trust me, a lot of things counter malph. He is quite weak.

Malphite is far from being overpowered. He is one of the old simplistic champions out there. His ult is almost the entire champion. Compared to any more recent champion, his kit got nothing. The descriptions for abilities nowadays are literally paragraphs long...

You can keep your flash for his ult or play a dash champion or even a champion with some kind of invulnerability, like fizz, xayah, sivir, etc. There a lot of counters.  You could also play sylas and a better version of him...
{{item:1054}} is a good start on {{champion:42}} as he needs some sort of survivability in mid.

It's a skillshot that's really easy to dodge. Play Xayah, keep an eye on him, and ult immediately when you see him start dashing at you. Or flash to the side. Or dash away. Literally anything. It targets a small circle and knocks up everything in that area.

Looking at your op.gg, you seem to be a Kai'Sa player who rushes attack speed instead of getting Stormrazor first, causing you to deal no damage in the early game. You also start Doran's Shield, even though that's a really bad item to start on an ADC unless you're terrified to death of your lane opponent repeat killing you, which you never should be if you're on your main champion and know what you're doing.

Here's a thing you can do: mark Malphite with your passive, and then when he ults, ult ANYWHERE in his range and I guarantee you his targeting will push him past your repositioning from your ult and he'll miss. It has a small range, only hits the circle and not the path along it, and it's literally his entire champion. If he's building full AP and you're dying to him, which would explain the 1-shot, I really don't feel sorry for you considering that you play one of the single best ADC's in the game at countering him and still fail to. You clearly don't understand the game at all.
